experiences.title: Cloud and Software Engineer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Landmark, Halliburton, Houston TX
workDescription: I spent the summer working for Landmark’s cloud engineering team. On this team, I was assigned a project to design and implement a data transfer application. I implemented this project with AWS and Azure Java SDKs and JavaFX. I was able to learn about Azure and AWS infrastructures, security methods, and IaC tools (like Terraform and Ansible).

experiences.title: IT and Development Intern
experiences.subtitle: AssuredPartners, Cranford NJ
workDescription: I spent the summer working for AssuredPartners primarily assisting with web migration from old angular to new angular. I also worked on a cross-disciplinary intern team to research and pitch a company improving idea. Finally, I was able to use the research to design an automation solution and cut down time spent on filling in renewal sheets by 90%.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Stoneview Technologies, Greenwich CT
workDescription: I spent the summer working for Stoneview Technologies, a hedge fund. I gained a foundational understanding of financial topics, utilizing skills I have learned in my business minor. Technically, I focussed on loading data with Python ETL loads from Quandl and writing queries to pull and validate data.

experiences.title: Technical Mentee
experiences.subtitle: Microsoft, Virtual
workDescription: I participated in a Microsoft mentorship program to cultivate technical resilience. I received a mentor and worked with them and my mentorship group to forge connection. This program helped me develop a growth mindset and connected me further with the computer science community.
